author: brianp
msg: Send output to the next filter even on header_only requests in mod_status

author: brianp
msg: Pass the brigade even on header_only requests

author: wrowe
msg: Thanks to Brian Havard for the heads-up

author: trawick
msg: Fix install-bindist.sh so that it finds any perl instead of just
early perl 5.x versions.  This is consistent with a build/install
from source, and it allows the perl scripts installed by a bindist
to work on systems with perl 5.6.

author: bnicholes
msg: Enabled Server-Side Includes by default in the /manual directory so that all
headers and footers will be included correctly in the documentation pages.
